member.name: M:ActivFinancial.ContentPlatform.ContentGatewayApi.GetMetaData.GetExchangeTimeZone(ActivFinancial.ContentPlatform.ContentGatewayApi.ContentGatewayClient,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the timezone for a symbol's exchange. The method will try to read and cache FID_MICROSOFT_TIME_ZONE field in the TABLE_NO_EXCHANGE (Microsoft TZ database format) for API built with .Net 4.0 and FID_OLSON_TIME_ZONE (Olson TZ database format) for APIs built with Silverlight and .Net 2.0 when invoked the first time. throws MiddlewareException exception if unable to get the exchange info from the ContentGateway or the exchange could not be determined for the provided symbol or the attempt to load exchange time zones failed because connection to the Content Gateway is not established.
member.param: a symbol (with exchange code) or an exchange code, e.g. "MSFT.Q" or just "Q".

member.name: M:ActivFinancial.ContentPlatform.ContentGatewayApi.Permission.IPermissionContext.GetFieldIdBitmap(System.Byte@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the allowed field id bitmap for a given permission id for this user, at a given permission level. This version of GetFieldIdBitmap() is for the normal case: a record or update has a single permission id and that permission id returns true from IsActualPermissionId(permissionId).
member.param: requested level, or PermissionLevelDefault to get the user's default for the permission id upon return.
member.returns: FieldIdBitmap for the given permission id and level.

member.name: M:ActivFinancial.ContentPlatform.ContentGatewayApi.Permission.IPermissionContext.GetFieldIdBitmap(System.Byte@,ActivFinancial.Middleware.FieldTypes.BinaryString)
member.summary: Get the allowed field id bitmap for a given permission id for this user, at a given permission level. This version of GetFieldIdBitmap() is the exceptional case: a record or update has a multiple permission ids assigned to it. In this case, the "normal" permission id will be PERMISSION_ID_LIST and there will be a separate field, FID_PERMISSION_ID_LIST, containing a list of permission ids. The field is a BinaryString and should be passed to this function.
member.param: requested level, or PermissionLevelDefault to get the user's default for the permission id upon return.
the FID_PERMISSION_ID_LIST field from a record or update.
member.returns: FieldIdBitmap for the given permission id and level.

member.summary: Get the allowed field id bitmap for a given permission id list for this user, at a given permission level. This version of getFieldIdBitmap() is the news update case: a news update has a multiple permission ids assigned to it.
member.param: requested level, or PermissionLevelDefault to get the user's default for the permission id upon return.
member.returns: FieldIdBitmap for the given permission id and level.
